name: Heroes Of Maidan 2
description:
Lead the army of heroes, General Zmyshenko, fight for the independence of the great Ukraine, build fortifications to repel the onslaught of the enemy.
- 3D5.0 graphics
- Many heroes
- Construction base
- Air battles like battlefield
- Tank battles like the world office of Tuttles
The game is exclusively entertaining. The author does not set the goal of insulting, humiliating, or discriminating on the basis of nationality of race, gender, opinion, profession, or other harm. Remember! Always together, no matter how, no matter where ...
